description:
I wouldn't challenge Adriano to a game of lacrosse anytime soon. He has been playing since he was three and he was handling the stick like it was an extension of his own body, twirling it and doing all kinds of maneuvers with it that really impressed me.
I was also impressed with his body! He's a 20-year-old, 6' Italian with beautiful blue eyes, a golden tan and a smile that would not stop. He's working as a chef at the family restaurant right now. So,think along the lines of coming home to a tall, tanned, muscled stud that will cook a meal for you!
He was very fun to be around and to watch as he stroked his cock. He was also ready for anything. He definitely has a laid back European approach to sex — he doesn't mind running around in a speedo, being naked, or showing off his slightly hairy ass. The instant I asked if he wanted to jerk off, he smiled with no hesitation..."Would love to!"
title: Adriano
